comment._content: Would you be so kind as to submit this item for exhibit at “Uncovering Male Flesh and Spirit (the artistry of male embodiment)”? We are located at www.flickr.com/groups/male_flesh_and_spirit/ Your photo admirably exemplifies the purposes and prerequisites of our group and hence will automatically be approved for display in the Group Pool. Gratefully, Dan Founder/Administrator
